remarks: Rewrite ~ rlim for a mapping operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2015.)
statement:
rlim2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. z e. A B e. CC ) $.
rlim2.2 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
rlim2.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
rlim2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( z e. A |-> B ) ~~>r C <-> A. x e. RR+ E. y e. RR A. z e. A ( y <_ z -> ( abs ` ( B - C ) ) < x ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ph x y $.
$d y z $.
